NK087(shu)008:1: // mdo khog rin chen sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)008:2: gsang 'dzin brtson seng bas bkod pa /
NK087(shu)008:4: spang bcom rtogs ldan blo yi yul las 'das //
NK087(shu)008:5: grub snang 'byung ba'i dpal ldan kun sgrol byed //
NK087(shu)008:6: gnyis med thugs rje'i rgyal po gzhan dbang sgyur //
NK087(shu)008:7: shin tu rnam grol lhun grub nyid la 'dud //
NK087(shu)008:8: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i don //
NK087(shu)008:9: dkyil 'khor gsum 'dus rtsa ba byang chub sems //
NK087(shu)008:10: gsang sgo gsum mtshon rgyud rgyal mdo yi don //
NK087(shu)008:11: gsal byed khog dbub rin chen sgron ma bri'o de la theg pa thams cad kyi yangs rtse /
NK087(shu)008:12: bstan pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas /
NK087(shu)008:13: rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po lung thams cad kyi spyi 'grel /
NK087(shu)008:14: man ngag thams cad kyi rtsa ba don thams cad kyi mjug sdud /
NK087(shu)008:15: chos thams cad kyi me long /
NK087(shu)008:16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i zhe phug /
NK087(shu)008:18: rgyal ba thams cad kyi gshegs shul /
NK087(shu)008:20: da ltar gyi rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi lam chen po /
NK087(shu)008:21: gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba /
NK087(shu)008:22: yang gsang rmad du byung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po
NK087(shu)008:23: chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus
NK087(shu)008:25: shes bya tshul lnga'i sgo nas ston par byed pa las /
NK087(shu)008:26: dang po 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad /
NK087(shu)008:27: dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbyer med du sangs rgyas pa'i
NK087(shu)008:28: tshul dang gcig sangs de ltar du rgyas kyis kyang
NK087(shu)008:29: / khams gsum gyi sems can gyis de ltar ma rtogs pa'i tshul dang gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:30: ma rtogs shing sdug bsngal gyi nyam thag pa de la /
NK087(shu)008:31: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad
NK087(shu)008:32: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs pa'i tshul dang gsum
NK087(shu)008:33: / gzigs nas thugs rje skyes pa'i tshul dang bzhi /
NK087(shu)008:34: skyes nas don mdzad tshul dang lnga'o //
NK087(shu)008:36: sems nyid skye ba med pa ye ji bzhin pa'i
NK087(shu)008:37: dkyil 'khor rtags su yi ge mam gyis mtshon par
NK087(shu)008:38: gnas la / skye ba med pa nyid 'gags pa
NK087(shu)008:39: med par shar ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i dkyil
NK087(shu)008:40: 'khor rtags su yi ge gyis mtshon par shar ro
NK087(shu)008:41: gnas la / // de gnyis kyang gnyis su med de /
NK087(shu)008:42: rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor rtags su yi ge h+aum gis mtshon par 'dus so //
NK087(shu)008:43: de yang le'u bcu dgu pa las /
NK087(shu)008:44: thams cad de nyid ro gcig pas //
NK087(shu)008:45: ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid //
NK087(shu)008:46: skye 'gag med pa'i snying po yin //
NK087(shu)008:47: bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum //
NK087(shu)008:48: ye nas grub zin lhun gyis grub //
NK087(shu)008:50: gnyis pa sangs rgyas kyis kyang /
NK087(shu)008:51: khams gsum gyi sems can gyis ma rtogs pa'i tshul la gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:52: dang po lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pas ngo ma shes pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:53: rgyal po'i phru gu dmangs su 'khyams pa lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:55: dkyil 'khor gsum du sangs rgyas kyang //
NK087(shu)008:56: mun pas sgribs pas de ma shes //
NK087(shu)008:58: gnyis pa kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pas log par bzung ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:59: rgyal phru gu dmangs kyi spyod pa byed pa lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:60: de yang nyer gnyis pa las /
NK087(shu)008:61: bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa yis //
NK087(shu)008:62: phyin ci log rtog brtson 'grus kyis //
NK087(shu)008:63: gnas ngan len de dad dpon byed //
NK087(shu)008:65: gsum pa mtshon par byed pa'i thabs lam dang bral ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:66: rgyal bu ston mkhan med pa lta bu ste /
NK087(shu)008:67: de yang le'u bco lnga pa las /
NK087(shu)008:68: mun pa mun nag sman rum 'khyams //
NK087(shu)008:69: sgrod par byed pa'i lam yang stor //
NK087(shu)008:71: gsum pa sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de la /
NK087(shu)008:72: thugs rjes gzigs pa'i tshul la gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:73: shes bya ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad skye med du gzigs pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:75: yang na 'khrul ba la brgyad de rgyu rkyen ngo
NK087(shu)008:76: bo 'khor tshul nyes pa dus dpe rang bzhin no
NK087(shu)008:77: // de la rgyu ma rig pa /
NK087(shu)008:78: rkyen las dang nyon mongs sam /
NK087(shu)008:80: 'khor tshul rten 'brel bcu gnyis nyes pa sdug bsngal /
NK087(shu)008:82: dus khams gsum spyi mtshan du thog mtha' med do //
NK087(shu)008:83: rang bzhin chos nyid ces par snyad do //
NK087(shu)008:84: rgyas pa la dga' ba la de ltar snyad do //
NK087(shu)008:85: gzigs pa de yul du byas na gzung 'dzin can du thal /
NK087(shu)008:86: ma byas na med pa gzigs pas 'khrul pa thal /
NK087(shu)008:87: dbyer med la gzigs bya gzigs byed med do zhe na /
NK087(shu)008:89: gsal la mi rtogs pas gzung 'dzin du mi 'agre'o //
NK087(shu)008:90: yul yang dag tu med pa la med par gzigs pas 'khrul pa yang /
NK087(shu)008:93: dbyer med la gzigs bya gzigs byed mi 'thad do zhe na /
NK087(shu)008:94: gzigs bya gzigs byed tha dad du grub pa med
NK087(shu)008:95: do dbyer med du rtogs pa'i ngang las phan gdags
NK087(shu)008:96: pa'i gzhir gyur pa de thugs rje'o //
NK087(shu)008:97: de yang sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med gcig tu rtogs na /
NK087(shu)008:98: thugs rje chen po skyes zhes de la byas zhes so //
NK087(shu)008:99: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'gag pa med par gzigs pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:100: dbyer med mkhyen pa ye shes kyis chos thams cad gnyis su med par gzigs pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:101: de yang zhe gnyis pa las /
NK087(shu)008:102: gang dam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid las ma g.yos par /
NK087(shu)008:103: sems can gyi khams mtha' thugs pa med pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:104: gzugs dang sgra dang spyod pa mtha' thug pa med pa rnams mi mkhyen pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:107: mi 'grel pa ni gang yang med do //
NK087(shu)008:109: snying po byang chub nyid la ma 'dres par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)008:110: zhes pa'i don gyis mkhyen lugs gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:112: ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis cir yang ma 'gags sa ler mkhyen pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:114: ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis cir yang dmigs pa med par mkhyen pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:115: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs sam ji lta ba dang ji
NK087(shu)008:116: snyed pa dbyer med mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis ma
NK087(shu)008:117: 'gags ma dmigs dbyer med du mkhyen pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:118: bzhi pa gzigs nas thugs rje skyes pa'i tshul ni /
NK087(shu)008:120: kun bzang thugs rje zhes pas don gyis /
NK087(shu)008:121: thugs rje'i skyes tshul rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK087(shu)008:122: rtag pa rgyun du thugs rje skye ba /
NK087(shu)008:123: rang bzhin shugs kyis thugs rje skye ba /
NK087(shu)008:124: yul dang phrad pas thugs rje skye ba /
NK087(shu)008:125: bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas thugs rje skye ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:126: rtag pa rgyun du thugs rje skye ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:127: chu bo chen po'i rgyun dang 'dra bas so de yang zhe bzhi pa las /
NK087(shu)008:129: thugs rje rtag pa'i sangs rgyas de //
NK087(shu)008:130: rang bzhin kun la khyad par gnas //
NK087(shu)008:132: yang sprul pa ni mi 'byung ma myong rgyun du byung ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:134: gnyis pa rang bzhin shugs kyis thugs rje skye ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:135: nyi ma la drod rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba dang 'dra ste /
NK087(shu)008:137: ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyiil 'khor ni //
NK087(shu)008:138: zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga' yang //
NK087(shu)008:139: thugs rje nyid gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad pa //
NK087(shu)008:141: gsum pa yul dang phrad nas thugs rje skye ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:142: dper na dgon pa kha lho ltas su nyi ma 'char ba bzhin te /
NK087(shu)008:144: de nas mthun 'jug skyes bu de //
NK087(shu)008:145: mthun pa'i spyan gyis gang gzigs na //
NK087(shu)008:146: las kyi yid dgas drag po de //
NK087(shu)008:148: bzhi pa bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas thugs rje skye ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:149: rgyal po la longs spyad slong ba dang 'dra ste /
NK087(shu)008:150: de yang le'u gsum par gdung ba nyer gsum bton pas /
NK087(shu)008:152: le'u bzhi par gsang bdag gis gdung ba bsal bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:153: lnga pa thugs rje skyes nas don mdzad tshul ni /
NK087(shu)008:154: rten can gyi don byed pa bram ze mchod sdong gis grub pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:155: rten med kyis don byed pa drang srong mod pa grub pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:156: ngo bo nyid kyis don mdzad pa nam mkha' lta bu la sogs ma nges kyis kyang /
NK087(shu)008:157: mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa 'di'i lugs kyis /
NK087(shu)008:158: gdul bya rnam pa gsum la /
NK087(shu)008:159: theg pa rnam pa gsum gyis /
NK087(shu)008:160: 'dul thabs gsum gyis sgo nas don mdzad pa las /
NK087(shu)008:164: theg pa gsum snang 'dul mdzad pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:167: gang zhig 'degs pa'i yul rnams ni //
NK087(shu)008:168: gsum du nges par snang ba ni //
NK087(shu)008:170: gdul dka' drag po'i gdul bya gsum //
NK087(shu)008:173: gang zhig 'degs pa rtsal gsum ni //
NK087(shu)008:174: 'khor lo rgyun dang don dam nges //
NK087(shu)008:176: rang bzhin ye nas snang ba yin //
NK087(shu)008:179: ji ltar 'degs pa theg rnams ni /
NK087(shu)008:180: bsam gyis mi khyab gsum nyid du //
NK087(shu)008:181: snang ba de nyid gang yin pa //
NK087(shu)008:182: rang bzhin shugs dang gnyen po thebs //
NK087(shu)008:183: las rgyun gcad pa 'ba' zhig go //
NK087(shu)008:184: zhes pa'i don gyis gdul bya gsum las 'dod pa la zhen pa'i gdul bya ni /
NK087(shu)008:187: mthun pa'i grogs 'dod pa rtsam las /
NK087(shu)008:188: byang chub sgrub pa'i bsam pa yang rgyud la ma skyes /
NK087(shu)008:189: nyon mongs pa drag po yang rgyud la ma skyes pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:190: nges par 'byung ba'i gdul bya ni /
NK087(shu)008:191: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brgyad dang bcu gcig la sogs pa la 'jigs nas /
NK087(shu)008:192: khams gsum las nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:193: gdul dka' drag pa'i gdul bya ni /
NK087(shu)008:194: 'dod chags tshal dang gar sbyin ltar du 'thas /
NK087(shu)008:196: gti mug mun pa ltar 'thibs pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa drag po skyes pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:197: de ltar gdul bya rnam pa gsum las /
NK087(shu)008:198: 'dod pa la zhen pa'i gdul bya la /
NK087(shu)008:199: theg pa rnam pa gsum las /
NK087(shu)008:201: gdul thabs rnam pa gsum las /
NK087(shu)008:202: rang bzhin shugs kyis 'dul thabs kyis don byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:203: 'byung ba lnga yis brten pa'i gnas byed skyed pa'i rgyu byed /
NK087(shu)008:205: nges par 'byung ba'i gdul bya don dam nges pa'i
NK087(shu)008:206: theg pas gnyen po thabs kyi 'dul thabs kyis don
NK087(shu)008:207: byed pa ni / zhe bzhi pa las /
NK087(shu)008:208: don dam nges pa'i theg pa ni //
NK087(shu)008:209: gsum du nges par snang ba ni //
NK087(shu)008:211: dbang bsgyur thabs kyi theg pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:212: zhes pa'i don gyis blo chung ba la kun 'byung skol mdo dang sbyar du rung ngo //
NK087(shu)008:213: 'dren pa'i thegs pa mtshan nyid sde gsum gyis 'dul /
NK087(shu)008:214: 'bring la dka' thub rigs byed kyi theg pa phyi pa sde gsum gyis 'dul /
NK087(shu)008:215: blo rab la dbang bsgyur thabs kyi theg pa nang pa bskyed rdzogs gsum gyis 'dul lo //
NK087(shu)008:216: gdul dka' drag po'i gdul bya la /
NK087(shu)008:217: cho 'phrul sngon 'byung gi theg pas las rgyun gcod pa'i gdul thabs kyis don byed pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:218: phyi nang gi skal pa zung gsum du 'bar mu ge'i nad kyi mtshon gyi nas /
NK087(shu)008:219: 'gro ba sems can gyi las rgyun gcod par byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:220: 'o na sems can gyi las kyi rgyun bcad pa de thugs rjer 'agro'am zhe na /
NK087(shu)008:222: las ngan myur du rgyun bcad na //
NK087(shu)008:223: gnas ngan dag las myur du grol //
NK087(shu)008:225: de ltar thegs pa gsum gyi nang nas /
NK087(shu)008:227: don dam nges pa'i theg mchog las /
NK087(shu)008:228: gsang sgo gsum mtshan mdo rgyud do //
NK087(shu)008:229: rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste //
NK087(shu)008:230: bya ba'i gzhi dang byed pa'i rkyen //
NK087(shu)008:231: bya bral 'bras bu'i rnam par dag /ces pas /
NK087(shu)008:232: theg pa gsum gyi nang nas don dam nges pa'i
NK087(shu)008:233: theg pa de'i nang nas kyang gsang sgo gsum mtshon
NK087(shu)008:234: par byed pa mdo rgyud 'di la /
NK087(shu)008:235: rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyis bshad de /
NK087(shu)008:236: bya ba gzhi'i rnal 'byor byed pa rkyen gyi rnal 'byor /
NK087(shu)008:238: de la bya ba gzhi'i rnal 'byor ni /
NK087(shu)008:240: phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i //
NK087(shu)008:241: chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems //
NK087(shu)008:242: ji bzhin ngang du ye gnas pas //
NK087(shu)008:243: shes par byed pa'i rgyud don yin zhes pa'i don gyis /
NK087(shu)008:244: shes bya phyi nang gi chos gzhi dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs ma bcos ma bslad pa /
NK087(shu)008:247: de bzhin nyid la ni sangs rgyas dang sems can
NK087(shu)008:248: dbye ba cung zad kyang med do zhes pa la
NK087(shu)008:250: byed pa rkyen gyi rnal 'byor ni /
NK087(shu)008:253: theg pa de ni bya byed rkyen //
NK087(shu)008:254: zhes pas don gyis rgyu las 'bras bu sgrub pa'i rtsol ba dang bcas pas /
NK087(shu)008:255: rnam par dkar ba'i spyod pa gdul bya khams gsum 'khor ba nas 'dren cing /
NK087(shu)008:256: mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jug par byed pa mtshan nyid sde gsum mo //
NK087(shu)008:258: gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med //
NK087(shu)008:259: bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas //
NK087(shu)008:260: thabs chen theg 'di bya bral ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:262: 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor nyid la yang de nyid phyi nang zhes pas /
NK087(shu)008:263: gsang sngags phyi rgyud sde gsum dang nang pa'i sde gsum mo //
NK087(shu)008:264: nang pa'i rgyud kyi nang nas mdo a nu yo ga'i dgongs 'dus 'di la /
NK087(shu)008:265: gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu yi //
NK087(shu)008:266: tshul gsum bye brag chos su bshad //
NK087(shu)008:268: gzhi lam 'bras bu dang gsum mo //
NK087(shu)008:269: gzhi ni ma'i don nyid de /
NK087(shu)008:271: gshis kyi gnas lugs yin te /
NK087(shu)008:273: lam ni thabs ni lam yin rnam pa gsum /
NK087(shu)008:274: gol sgrib ngo bo yan lag ste /
NK087(shu)008:277: lam gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gol sgrib dang gcig
NK087(shu)008:278: /ngo bo dang gnyis rkyen yan lag dang gsum mo
NK087(shu)008:279: // gol sgrib bstan pa la gsum /
NK087(shu)008:285: gol sa ltung ba'i sgo dgu bdud du ltung ba'i
NK087(shu)008:286: srin por mu stegs su nganasonga du 3tshan chen du
NK087(shu)008:287: / ru trar lha chen du dang //
NK087(shu)008:290: nyon mongs dug lnga brten pa'i bag chags kyi don mthong du mi ster ro //
NK087(shu)008:291: shes bya'i sgrib sogs nyon mongs pa ma yin pas
NK087(shu)008:292: shes bya la sgrib cing ye shes 'phel ba'i gegs
NK087(shu)008:295: thun mong rtog pa brgyad cu sbyor triba'i /
NK087(shu)008:304: rtags kyi rtog bdunpa'o gcig /dgu bcu la sogs skyon rnams dang //
NK087(shu)008:305: shes pa'i bye brag drug la sogs //
NK087(shu)008:306: mi mthun gol sgrib phyogs su bshad //
NK087(shu)008:309: ngo bo thabs dang shes rab zer gyis kyang /
NK087(shu)008:312: sngon byung gi lam dang rjes 'jug gi lam gnyis su bshad do //
NK087(shu)008:314: sku gsum 'khor gyi lam bgrod tshul le'u dang po'o //
NK087(shu)008:315: rgyal tshab skyes bu'i lam bgrod tshul le'u bcu gcig pa /
NK087(shu)008:316: ru tra 'khor bcas kyis lam bgrod tshul le'u nyer brgyad nas so gcig man chad /
NK087(shu)008:317: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i lam bgrod tshul zhe brgyad pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:318: rjes 'jug gi lam la gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:319: thun mong pa spyi'i lam dang /
NK087(shu)008:320: khyad par mdo 'di nyid kyi lam mo //
NK087(shu)008:322: spyod pa 'dren sgo mtshan nyid sde gsum thabs kyi sbyor sgo phyi pa sde gsum /
NK087(shu)008:323: nges pa'i gsang sgo nang pa sde gsum /
NK087(shu)008:327: de ltar theg pa dgu ka lam du khyer nas 'bras bu la sbyor ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:328: khyad par 'di nyid kyi lam la gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:329: thabs lam gtso bor thabs dang gdam ngag gi sgo nas nyams su len pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:330: shes gtso bor dpyad gsum gyis rgyud grol ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:333: rol pa'i ka ra la sogs pa /
NK087(shu)008:334: man ngag thabs kyis der 'jug dang /
NK087(shu)008:336: rim gyis pa steng sgo 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa'i
NK087(shu)008:337: thabs dang cig char ba 'og sgo mkha' gsang gnyis
NK087(shu)008:338: la brten te sgom pa'i thabs so //
NK087(shu)008:340: thos bsam sgom pa'i tshul 'gro ba'i //
NK087(shu)008:341: de ni 'jug pa rnam gsum ste //
NK087(shu)008:342: rtog dpyod don du yi ge de //
NK087(shu)008:343: rjes 'jug ces pas gsum du bshad kyang /
NK087(shu)008:344: don bzhir shes par bya ste /
NK087(shu)008:345: rtog dpyod kyi rjes su 'jug pa lta ba gtan la dbab pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:346: don gyi rjes su 'jug pa rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:347: yi ge rjes su 'jug pa mtshan bcas lha bsgom pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:348: don du yi ge thun mong gi rjes su 'jug pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:351: dang po sngon 'gro nyid blo yi stobs kyi rnam pa gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:353: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis /
NK087(shu)008:354: rtsol ba med par cig car du gtan la dbab pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:355: blo chung bas rigs pa'i gtan tshig gis brtags dpyad byas nas /
NK087(shu)008:356: rims kyis gtan la dbab pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:358: lung las grags pa'i don rnams la //
NK087(shu)008:359: rigs pa'i gtan tshigs mtha' dag tu //
NK087(shu)008:360: man ngag nges pa'i tshad ma yin //
NK087(shu)008:361: so sor rtog dang rtsol med par //
NK087(shu)008:362: rims dang tshig char gtan la 'bebs /
NK087(shu)008:364: gnyis pa don gyi rjes su 'jug pa la yang gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:365: don la 'jug pa'i tshul sgo nas /
NK087(shu)008:368: zhes pas rim gyis pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:370: rim gyis pa la zag bcas dang /
NK087(shu)008:372: zag bcas la sogs lam dang sbyor lam gnyis so //
NK087(shu)008:376: de la zag bcas la don rnam pa gsum zhe'o ste /
NK087(shu)008:377: ting nge 'dzin gyis ngo bo'i khyad par dang /
NK087(shu)008:378: sems skye lugs kyi khyad par dang /
NK087(shu)008:379: skyon gyis dbang du 'gyur mi 'gyur gyi khyad par dang /
NK087(shu)008:380: dape'am rtags kyi khyad par bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:383: gsal 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa dang brtan rten
NK087(shu)008:384: pa bzhi'i sa dang yun ring gal chen sbyor ba'i
NK087(shu)008:385: sa dang / shin tu bslab pa rgyun gyis yun
NK087(shu)008:386: ring tshad las bsod nams gter gyis 'das zhes so
NK087(shu)008:387: sa dang / // skyon gyi dbang du 'gyur mi 'gyur gyi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:388: don bsdus las mi mthun phyogs dang phrad pa'i tshe /
NK087(shu)008:389: de 'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor dang po la gnas pa'i dus su dbang du 'gyur dang /
NK087(shu)008:390: cung zad du las dong ba mi 'gyur /
NK087(shu)008:391: sa gnyis pa thang cig gnas pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:392: gsal rigs chen 'byed pa'i bar brtan pa'i sa gsum pa la rigs goms dang //
NK087(shu)008:393: mtshan ma rtags kyi rang dbang 'gyur dang cher sa bzhi pa la brtan dang //
NK087(shu)008:394: spyod lam kun tu spyod pa rgyun gyis lnga pa la rlung gnas yin //
NK087(shu)008:396: sems skye lugs kyi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:397: mnyam nyid gsang ba'i bde don la //
NK087(shu)008:398: sa dang po la dad dang mos dang der sa gnyis pa la brtson dang //
NK087(shu)008:399: de der sa gsum pa la g.yo dang sa bzhi pa la cher g.yos dang //
NK087(shu)008:400: sa lnga pa la mtho dang 'dra bar 'gyur yin te //
NK087(shu)008:402: dape'am rtags kyi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:403: skar tshogs lam bdun pa sems kyi rnal 'byor gyi
NK087(shu)008:404: dus su 'phran ltar du mthong 'bring dang las dang
NK087(shu)008:405: po 'di dang chen po rigs chen 'byed pa'i dang
NK087(shu)008:406: // mtshan ma rtags kyi cig pa gnyis pa'i spyod
NK087(shu)008:407: pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor gyi dus su zla ba
NK087(shu)008:410: zag bcas yin pa'i rgyu mtshan ni //
NK087(shu)008:411: de dag zag bcas bsam gtan te //
NK087(shu)008:412: gnyis med yul bral der tha min //
NK087(shu)008:414: zag med la don gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:415: dang po mthong lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo'i khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:416: rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du gsal bar sa
NK087(shu)008:417: drug pa rten pa'i khyad par du spro ba'i sa
NK087(shu)008:418: la gnas pa'i dus su mthong bas yon tan gyi
NK087(shu)008:419: khyad par ni / dbugs dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal
NK087(shu)008:420: 'byor dbugs phyin te zag pa zad nas 'jig rten
NK087(shu)008:421: khyad par ni / 'das / dpe yi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:422: gsum pa'i ri bo can 'dra yin //
NK087(shu)008:424: sgom lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo dmigs pa'i khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa ni /
NK087(shu)008:425: rnal 'byor ni lung chen thob pa'i /
NK087(shu)008:426: mthong ba'i don la mnyam gnas pas //
NK087(shu)008:428: yon tan gyi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:434: mthar lam gyi ting nge sa gsum ste 'dzin gyi ngo bo'i khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:435: rang dang spyi'i tha snyad bral //
NK087(shu)008:436: dmigs med kun gsal ye shes nyid //
NK087(shu)008:437: yon tan gyi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:438: gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'i sa g.yo dang brdal ba
NK087(shu)008:439: chos nyid thob dang gnas rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa spyi'i
NK087(shu)008:440: khyab kyi sa / rim pas mthar phyin gsum du gnas //
NK087(shu)008:443: bcu drug tshul du gsal zhes pas so //
NK087(shu)008:444: don gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i cig char ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:446: gang dag blo chen mngon rtogs pas //
NK087(shu)008:447: mnyam nyid yul bral rang gsal ba //
NK087(shu)008:448: mi g.yo cig car gang 'jug pa //
NK087(shu)008:449: sa dang lam gyi grangs rtsol med //
NK087(shu)008:452: dpe na mtha' dbus mnyam nyid la //
NK087(shu)008:453: bsdud de cig car gang 'jug pa //
NK087(shu)008:454: ting 'dzin gnas yun ring thung dang //
NK087(shu)008:455: las 'phro yod dang med pa yi //
NK087(shu)008:456: nam 'grub mnyam pa'i kha ma lus //
NK087(shu)008:458: rtogs pa grol ba dus gcig pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:459: gsum pa yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:460: yi ge mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dag /blo yi khyad par ches phra yis //
NK087(shu)008:461: thams cad gsal rdzogs cig car dang /
NK087(shu)008:462: lnga pa gsum la sogs par snang //
NK087(shu)008:466: de la rim gyiis pa la /
NK087(shu)008:467: lam lnga sa bcu dang sbyor nas bshad de /
NK087(shu)008:470: mthong lam la sa gcig /sgom lam la sa gcig /mthar lam la sa gsum mo //
NK087(shu)008:471: de re re la yang chos bzhi bzhi dang ldan par bya ste /
NK087(shu)008:472: tshom bu'i grang dang rnam pa'i khyad par dang /
NK087(shu)008:476: sa dang po pa 'dun pa sems dpa' bas brgyad
NK087(shu)008:477: pa bde ba chen po'i lha'i phyag rgya gcig pa
NK087(shu)008:478: dang // gnyis 'brel sa gnyis pa las dang po pa'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang //
NK087(shu)008:479: sa gsum pa 'khor rnal 'byor ni rig chen 'byed
NK087(shu)008:480: pa lo gcig dang rnam sa bzhi pa mtshan ma
NK087(shu)008:481: rtags spros dang // shin tu sa lnga pa spyod pa rgyun rnam spros dkyil 'khor dang //
NK087(shu)008:482: sa drug pa dbugs chen 'byin pa gling gcig gang
NK087(shu)008:483: dang stong sa bdun pa lung chen thob pa'i gsum
NK087(shu)008:484: gang // grangs med nam mkha' khyab tshad lhun gyis
NK087(shu)008:485: grub pa chos kyi dbyings kyi khyab tshad shin tu
NK087(shu)008:486: grangs med pa sa dgu pa rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i
NK087(shu)008:487: gang // / chos dbyings sa bcu pa lhun gyis
NK087(shu)008:488: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i dus su mtha'
NK087(shu)008:491: gnyis pa rnam pa'i khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:492: yang sa dang po la rtog dang tshogs lam pa mtshan sa gnyis pa la ma'i rnal 'byor dang //
NK087(shu)008:493: spyod lam dang chu zla sa gsum pa la lta bur bzung med dang //
NK087(shu)008:494: sa bzhi pa gzung 'dzin gnyis bral de nyid dang //
NK087(shu)008:495: sa lnga pa la ci la'ang mi gnas mnyam nyid dang //
NK087(shu)008:496: mthong lam pa rang gi mtshan nyid sa drug pa la gsal nges dang //
NK087(shu)008:497: bsgom lam pa sa bdun pa la zag pa med dang lhun grub pa'i //
NK087(shu)008:498: sa brgyad pa la thob dang shin tu mthar lam sa dgu pa thob pa rgyun dang //
NK087(shu)008:499: sa bcu pa brtan rdzogs nyid de rnam bcu'o //
NK087(shu)008:501: gsum pa phyag rgya'i khyon ni /
NK087(shu)008:502: tshad kyang khru bzhi 'dun pa sems pa'i dus su
NK087(shu)008:503: brgyad cu las dang po drug rigs chen 'byed pa'i
NK087(shu)008:504: / sum cu mtshan ma rtags kyi gnyis dang drug cu spyod pa rgyun gyi bzhi //
NK087(shu)008:505: de bzhin sgyur dbugs chen 'byin pa'i 'khor yug sogs chos dbyings rnams lha gsal //
NK087(shu)008:508: sa dang po la gnas dus 'phro 'du dbugs yul dang /
NK087(shu)008:509: gnyis pa dri dang gsum pa sgra dang /
NK087(shu)008:510: bzhi pa gzugs sogs rim bzhin 'phags /
NK087(shu)008:511: sa lnga pa'i dus su ging gcig /drug pa'i dus su 'khor yug /bdun pa'i stong gsum /
NK087(shu)008:512: brgyad pa la sems kyi khyab tshad /
NK087(shu)008:514: lhun gyis grub pa chos kyi dbyings kyi khyab tshad /
NK087(shu)008:515: dgu pa la nam mkha' khyab tshad /
NK087(shu)008:516: bcu pa rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa non pa'i
NK087(shu)008:517: dus su chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad du 'phro
NK087(shu)008:519: yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa'i cig char ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:520: don bsdus las thams cad gsal rdzogs cig car dang //
NK087(shu)008:521: lnga dang bcu la sogs par snang //
NK087(shu)008:524: gtan yul dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs //
NK087(shu)008:527: phyi snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang /
NK087(shu)008:528: nang bcud kyi sems thams cad phyag rgya lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom pa yin te /
NK087(shu)008:531: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:532: bzhi pa don dang yi ge thun mong gi rjes su 'jug pa la gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:533: rims kyis pa blo che shos la lnga lnga dbye ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:534: 'bring la bcu bcur dbye ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:535: tha ma la sum cu so drug gam bzhi bcur dbye bar bshad do //
NK087(shu)008:536: de dag la yang gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:537: mi bstan pa don bstan pa /
NK087(shu)008:538: lam lnga la gnas pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:539: de la mi bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:541: sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang //
NK087(shu)008:542: sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang //
NK087(shu)008:543: spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang //
NK087(shu)008:544: dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang //
NK087(shu)008:545: lta ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur rnams //
NK087(shu)008:546: bye brag lam lnga'i chos sku snang //
NK087(shu)008:547: rnam par sa bcu'i lam rnams la //
NK087(shu)008:548: khyad par de dag rnam bcur gsal //
NK087(shu)008:550: de'i don rnam nges tshig ni /
NK087(shu)008:551: don dang yi ge gang de yang //
NK087(shu)008:552: so so'i gnas skabs lam dag nyid //
NK087(shu)008:553: bgrod dang de chos ldan pa ci'i phyir lam zhe na bgrod pas na lam dang //
NK087(shu)008:554: rgyud mi gtong bas ni rig 'dzin dang rten byed pas na sa'o dang //
NK087(shu)008:555: dus de skabs zhes pa'i thad la bab pa na
NK087(shu)008:556: dang skabs so 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin rtogs
NK087(shu)008:558: gegs su gyur pas na sgrib pa'o dang 'dra ba'i ltung gnas su gyur pas na gol sa dang //
NK087(shu)008:559: rtsol zhing ma bral bas rtogs pa'i sgrod pa'i lam sems dang //
NK087(shu)008:560: spyod lam lta ba dang ting 'dzin rjes su mthun
NK087(shu)008:561: par spyod pas na'o kun tu blo gnas pas na
NK087(shu)008:563: mi 'da' srung pas na dam tshig go dang dus
NK087(shu)008:564: nyid de nyid du nges pas na dus su dang
NK087(shu)008:565: // yon tan mthu dang ldan pas na dngos grub bo bya bral mthar thug pas na dang //
NK087(shu)008:566: shes rab stobs dang shes rab che chung gi lta ba la khyad par byung zhing khyad par las //
NK087(shu)008:567: tha snyad tha snyad kyi sgo nas kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur bstan pa'o bye brag rnam gsum gsungs //
NK087(shu)008:569: shin tu rgyas par dbye na /
NK087(shu)008:570: gzhan yang sems bskyed sngags la sogs //
NK087(shu)008:571: lam gyi chos sgo tha dad kun //
NK087(shu)008:572: lnga dang bcu sogs grags pa yin //
NK087(shu)008:574: gsum pa lam lnga la gnas pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par ni /
NK087(shu)008:575: sa dang po dang gnyis pa la gnas pas gsang
NK087(shu)008:576: chen gyi 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i lam gyi
NK087(shu)008:577: rten byed pa gsum pa la gnas pa'i rkyen gyis
NK087(shu)008:579: lta bsgom rtog pa'i gzungs kyi zin /
NK087(shu)008:580: sa bzhi pa la gnas pas ni /
NK087(shu)008:581: lus ngan pa len mi srid de bde 'gro lha dang mi'i 'bras bu thob /
NK087(shu)008:582: sa lnga pa la gnas pas ni bde 'gro 'dod
NK087(shu)008:583: khams la sogs par yang mi ltung ste 'khor ba
NK087(shu)008:584: las thag bsrings / sa drug pa la gnas pas ni zag pa dang bral bas /
NK087(shu)008:585: khams kyi 'jigs pa me chu la sogs pas mi tshugs /
NK087(shu)008:586: sa bdun pa la gnas pas ni /
NK087(shu)008:587: theg pa 'og ma par mi zlog /zhi bde la mi gnas shing /
NK087(shu)008:589: sa brgyad pa la gnas pas ni /
NK087(shu)008:590: mi shes pa'i skyon dang bral zhing shes bya khong du chud /
NK087(shu)008:591: sa dgu pa la gnas pas dus su /
NK087(shu)008:592: lam mthar rdzogs su nye zhing 'bras bu myur du sbyor /
NK087(shu)008:594: sa sgrod dgos par mi zlog cing sangs rgyas kyi
NK087(shu)008:595: sa la thogs pa med pa mngon du 'gyur zhing
NK087(shu)008:596: / lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan dang ldan no //
NK087(shu)008:597: gsum pa lam gyi rkyen yan lag ni /
NK087(shu)008:599: de rkyen yan lag rnam pa gnyis //
NK087(shu)008:600: sgrub byed rkyen dang shes byed pa'i //
NK087(shu)008:602: lam bsgrub byed kyi rkyen yan lag dang /
NK087(shu)008:603: lam shes byed kyi rkyen yan lag go //
NK087(shu)008:605: lam gyi yan lag sum cu gnyis //
NK087(shu)008:606: mdo dang gzhi dang bslab pa'i mtha' //zhes pas spyi don gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:607: sngags kyi skol mdo bcu gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:611: theg pa rim pa dgu ka la sbyar du rung yang /
NK087(shu)008:612: skabs 'dir a nu la sbyor te //
NK087(shu)008:613: mdo ni bcu gnyis 'jug sgo dang //
NK087(shu)008:615: 'jug pa'i sgo dbyings dang ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jug /dam tshig ting 'dzin lta ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:616: zhes pas dam tshig ni snying rje'i dam tshig dang /
NK087(shu)008:617: chos nyid kyi dam tshig srung /
NK087(shu)008:618: lta ba ni dbyings ye shes gnyis su med par lta /
NK087(shu)008:620: don dang yi ge'i rjes su zhugs nas /
NK087(shu)008:621: mtshan bcas dang mtshan med sgom mo //
NK087(shu)008:622: dmigs pa zlas pa phrin las ni dang /
NK087(shu)008:624: dmigs pa thams cad rang gi sems kyi bdag nyid chen por dmigs /
NK087(shu)008:625: zlas pa ni brag cha ltar grags stong dbyer med
NK087(shu)008:626: du zlos phrin las ni zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhis
NK087(shu)008:627: don mdzad / spyod lam dang ni thob bya'i dbang /
NK087(shu)008:628: zhes pas spyod pa ni thabs kyi spyod pa /
NK087(shu)008:629: dbang bsgyur gyi spyod pa byed /
NK087(shu)008:630: thob bya'i dbang ni khro bo'i dbang mchog sum cu rtsa drug bskur rig 'dzin dang sangs rgyas pa /
NK087(shu)008:631: zhes pas rig 'dzin gyi sa ni /
NK087(shu)008:632: sgra la gnas pa'i lam la gnas pa'i tshe la dbang ba'i /
NK087(shu)008:633: phyag rgya chen po'i lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin no //
NK087(shu)008:636: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen thob //
NK087(shu)008:637: nges 'byed yan lag dag tu bshad //
NK087(shu)008:639: lta ba nges par byed pa'i yan lag /chos rtags
NK087(shu)008:640: kyi phyag rgya bzhis lta ba'i don nges par byed
NK087(shu)008:641: do // gsang sngags kyi gzhi bcu ni /
NK087(shu)008:642: gzhi ni rnam bcu sgrub pa dang //
NK087(shu)008:643: zhes pas sgrub pa sgyu ma lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:644: gsang sngags mi dang spyod pa dang //
NK087(shu)008:646: gsang sngags kyi mi smig sgyu lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:647: spyod pa rmi lam lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:648: dngos grub gnas dang zlas pa'i sgra //
NK087(shu)008:649: zhes pas dngos grub gzugs brnyan lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:650: gnas dri za'i grong khyer lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:651: bzlas pas brag cha lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:652: phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta ba dang //
NK087(shu)008:654: phyag rgya chu zla lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:655: ting nge 'dzin chu'i chu bur lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:656: lta ba mig yor lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:657: cho 'phrul dag ste de dag don //
NK087(shu)008:658: zhes pas cho 'phrul 'gal me skor ba lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:659: de ltar dpe bcus mtshon nas don la gnas shing yang dag pa'i don sgrub par byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:661: bslab pa'i mtha' ni rnam bcu ste //
NK087(shu)008:662: dam tshig gzhi dang rgyud 'grol dang //
NK087(shu)008:663: sgo mor skur dang yul dbyung dang //
NK087(shu)008:664: dbang rim la dor spyod pa dang //
NK087(shu)008:665: thag bcad pa dang nyams slang dang //
NK087(shu)008:666: man ngag don dang mdor bsdus rnams //
NK087(shu)008:667: rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcur bshad //
NK087(shu)008:668: ces pa'i don gyis gzhi dam tshig gis bzung ba bsdus par chad nas ming tsam 'chad /
NK087(shu)008:669: 'bring gzhi 'dzin pa ni dam tshig ste /
NK087(shu)008:670: sgo gsum sgom par gnas pa'i don //
NK087(shu)008:671: rtsa ba yan lag la sogs pa'i //
NK087(shu)008:672: srung dang sgrub pa de nyid do //
NK087(shu)008:673: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don dang sbyar nas bshad /
NK087(shu)008:674: rgyas par 'chad nas spyi don bzhi bzhi bshad do //
NK087(shu)008:675: la bslab pa zhing sa gshin po so nam byed pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:676: rgyud thos pas grol ba gyi ling sgrog grol ba lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:677: sgo kun nas bsdu ba la bslab pa bung ba tshang 'tshol ba lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:678: phul du mkhas pas dbyung ba la bslab pa ri rgyal lhun po'i rtser phyin pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:679: rim pa dbang gis sgrol ba rgyal bu rgyal sa 'dzin pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:680: la spyod pas dor ba la bslab pa glang po ches chu brgal ba lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:681: thag lta bas bcad pa la bslab pa khyung dar ma nam mkha' la lding ba lta bus bstan /
NK087(shu)008:682: nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis blang ba la bslab
NK087(shu)008:683: pa nor bu rin po che ston pa'i ded dpon
NK087(shu)008:684: lta bu / don man ngag gis sgrub pa la
NK087(shu)008:685: bslab pa gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu mdo don
NK087(shu)008:686: gcig tu 'du bar bslab pa so nam gyis khe
NK087(shu)008:687: sgrub pa lta bu'am dgongs mal lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:688: shes byed kyi rkyen yan lag la gsum /
NK087(shu)008:693: rgyud ni byin rlabs 'byung ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:694: lung bstan rgyud pa rnam gnyis so //
NK087(shu)008:696: byin rlabs 'byung ba'i rgyud bstan pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:697: lung bstan rgyud pa'i rgyud bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:699: byin rlabs sku bzhi'i bstan pa dag /ces pas /
NK087(shu)008:702: bstan pa bzhis gsungs pa'i ngos nas byin rlabs 'byung ba'i rgyud la /
NK087(shu)008:703: thub pa'i dbang pos lung bstan pa ltar /
NK087(shu)008:704: phyag na rdo rjes mi yul du gsang sngags kyi
NK087(shu)008:705: rgyud rnams rig 'dzin mi dang mi ma yin pa
NK087(shu)008:706: la / bshad pa'i ngos nas lung bstan rgyud pa'i rgyud do //
NK087(shu)008:707: gsum pa gtan la dbab pa la gnyis las /
NK087(shu)008:708: byin rlabs 'byung ba'i rgyud la yang gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:711: lde mig gis sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:713: bshad thabs lde mig rnam gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:714: zhes pas spyi'i zhor la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo nas gtan la dbab pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:715: rgyud sgo drug phyi nang gnyis su bsdus te sgo gnyis gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig go //
NK087(shu)008:716: gnyis pa khyad par la sngags mtshan nyid kyi khyar par dang /
NK087(shu)008:717: sngags nang gi khyad par dang /
NK087(shu)008:718: bskyed rdzogs gsum nang gi khyad par la sogs pa shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)008:719: gsum pa sgo dang lde mig rgyas par bshad pa la gnyis las /
NK087(shu)008:720: dang po spyod pa'i 'dren sgo gtan la dbab pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:723: nges par 'byin pa rnam gsum mo //
NK087(shu)008:724: zhes pa yan lag rgyu'i yan lag /sbyor ba'i yan lag /
NK087(shu)008:733: don dam nges pa'i bla ma thabs gis 'byed /
NK087(shu)008:734: mdo bzhis 'grol rtsa ba gsum gyis 'byin pas sde bkod pa rnam 'grel gyis ston /
NK087(shu)008:735: sgo gnyis kyi lde mig ni /
NK087(shu)008:736: sgo gnyis spyi dang khyad par las //
NK087(shu)008:737: zhes pas gnyis las sgo gnyis spyir bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:738: spyi yang rnam gsum yan lag mdo rtsa ba dag gis 'grel bar byed /
NK087(shu)008:740: yan lag drug gi rgyu'i rtsa ba /
NK087(shu)008:750: dam par nges pa yongs su zin pa 'byed /
NK087(shu)008:751: mdo bzhis 'grel rtsa ba gsum gyis 'byin pa ste bsdu ba rnam gsum gyis ston no //
NK087(shu)008:753: khyad par gsang sgo'i rnam 'grel par /
NK087(shu)008:754: yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba yis 'byed 'grol nges par 'byin par byed /
NK087(shu)008:760: 'byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang //
NK087(shu)008:761: 'brel pa tshig dang nges pa sbyor //
NK087(shu)008:763: de yang spyi don chen po drug gis bshad de /
NK087(shu)008:765: gang du dgos pa gang nges dang //
NK087(shu)008:766: ngo bo dmigs dang bcas pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:768: dang po rgyu'i yan lag smos pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:769: khungs smos pas yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)008:771: rgyu ni gleng gzhi drug yin te //
NK087(shu)008:772: bstan pa don gang dus gang tshe ston pa gang nyid kyis //
NK087(shu)008:773: gnas gang du 'khor gang la gang brjod bsdud pa po'o //
NK087(shu)008:776: gtan pa 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)008:777: rnam grangs rnam par phye ste don gyi dmigs bzung
NK087(shu)008:778: ba shin tu rgyas par bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
NK087(shu)008:779: gleng gzhi rab tu rgyas par sku lnga'i /
NK087(shu)008:781: bsdus par spyi dang mthun par sku bzhi las ni /
NK087(shu)008:782: sku bzhi'i rdo rjer 'dzin pa chen po'i gleng gazhi'o //
NK087(shu)008:783: de yang dang po chos sku'i gleng gzhi ni /
NK087(shu)008:784: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i de kho na nyid snang ba'i dus gcig na /
NK087(shu)008:786: gnas ni kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du /
NK087(shu)008:787: ston pa chos kyi skus blo gros can gyis 'khor la /
NK087(shu)008:788: gtan pa don dam nges pa'i tshig tu /
NK087(shu)008:789: dus ni dus bzhi brjod du med par gsungs la /
NK087(shu)008:790: sdud pa po phyag na rdo rjer mdzad do //
NK087(shu)008:792: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid kyis tshig
NK087(shu)008:793: 'di skad du mthun 'jug thabs su thos pa'i dus
NK087(shu)008:795: gnas 'og min chen po'i pho brang du ston pa longs sku'i /
NK087(shu)008:797: bstan pa ldems dgongs sbyor ba'i tshig tu /
NK087(shu)008:798: dus dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gsungs pa las /
NK087(shu)008:801: rgya cher brjod pa ldems dgongs kyi tshig 'di skad
NK087(shu)008:802: du bkri thabs su thos pa'i don cig na zhes
NK087(shu)008:803: pas / gnas mos pa can gyi 'jig rten du /
NK087(shu)008:805: 'khor lha mi skal ba can la /
NK087(shu)008:806: bstan pa kri tra rgyud pa'i tshig tu /
NK087(shu)008:807: dus sgron ma yongs su bkod pa'i dus su gsungs pa yang /
NK087(shu)008:808: sdud pa po phyag na rdo rje gyis mdzad do //
NK087(shu)008:809: gsang ba sku'i gleng gzhi ni /
NK087(shu)008:810: 'dod pa rang rkyen gyi tshig 'di skad du /
NK087(shu)008:811: ma bkag chos nyid du dgongs pa rang snang bar thos pa'i dus gcig na /
NK087(shu)008:813: gnas ni gtsug tor 'khor lo bsgyur ba yum gyi mkhar /
NK087(shu)008:814: ston pa gsang ba'i skus zhen chags can gyi 'khor la /
NK087(shu)008:815: bstan pa 'dod pa rang rkyen gyi tshig tu /
NK087(shu)008:816: dus gsang dbang bskur zhing 'og sgo nyams su len pa'i dus su gsungs pa yang /
NK087(shu)008:817: sdud pa po phyag na rdo rjer mdzad pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:818: rgyas pa zhes bdun pas bstan no //
NK087(shu)008:820: rtsa ba gleng slong rkyen nyid de //
NK087(shu)008:821: ji ltar slong nas zhus bshad tshul //
NK087(shu)008:824: mdun bsus gus dang dri ba dris //
NK087(shu)008:825: skabs las gleng du slong ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:827: ston pas mdun bsu nas gleng bslang ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:828: 'khor gyis gus pas dri ba dris te gleng bslang ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:829: zhe brgyad pa nas ston no //
NK087(shu)008:831: 'brel ba gang brjod gang gis brjod //
NK087(shu)008:832: gang phyir gang gis stobs kyis bshad //
NK087(shu)008:834: 'brel ba'i yan lag rnam pa bzhir /
NK087(shu)008:836: brjod bya 'brel dgongs tha ma gnyis bzhi 'dren pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:839: dang po 'brel pa la gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:840: thabs dang thabs byung gi 'brel pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:842: badz+ra kar ma tsag kra s+w+aa ta ha ha ham zhes skyes bu dbang bskur ba ni thabs /
NK087(shu)008:843: las kyi rdo rjer dbang thob ste //
NK087(shu)008:845: 'chad pa'i skye bur gyur pa ni thabs las byung ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:846: de dang de las byung ba'i 'brel ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:847: e ma ho bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i 'di ni /
NK087(shu)008:850: 'di ltar mkhas pa 'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:851: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang 'brel zhing /
NK087(shu)008:853: de kho na nyid dang 'brel zhing de kho na nyid las skyes pa lags so zhes bshad do //
NK087(shu)008:854: brjod bya ni rang bzhin gyis sbas pa'i chos nyid do //
NK087(shu)008:855: brjod byed brda' dpe lde mig dang bcas pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:857: dgos pa ni don rtogs pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:858: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni bde gshegs kyi thugs mnyam
NK087(shu)008:859: nyid rang nyid rang rig pas mngon du gyur pa'o
NK087(shu)008:860: // zhe dgu pa nas ston no //
NK087(shu)008:862: rang bzhin lta ba nges don dang //
NK087(shu)008:863: spyi sdud pa dang rnam par dbye //
NK087(shu)008:865: rang lugs nyid dang brgal lan dang //
NK087(shu)008:866: ldem dgongs brda' dang dpe mtshon dang //
NK087(shu)008:867: man ngag gab sbas 'byin sdebs rnams //
NK087(shu)008:868: dpe bcu lta bur mtshon pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:870: rang bzhin lta ba'i tshig khyung dar ma nam mkha' la lding ba lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:871: spyi don sdud pa'i tshig seng ge mchong ba lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:872: rnam par dbye ba'i tshig stag gi mchong pan lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:873: rang skyes gnyer gyi tshig ru sbal gyi nur 'gros lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:874: 'brel pa sbyor ba'i tshig bya ngang mo'i 'jol 'gros lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:875: tshad ma bka' gzhung gi tshig dus kyi 'brug char lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:876: gtar ka gags sel gyi tshig glag khra mo gzan la bcum pa lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:877: ldem dgongs man ngag gi tshig rna phrug brag la 'dzeg pa lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:878: mtshon pa dpe'i tshig me long g.ya' dag pa lta bu dang /
NK087(shu)008:879: snol mtshams 'phen sdud kyi tshig seng phrug rtsal sbyong ba lta bu'i dang bcu'i sgo nas 'chad do //
NK087(shu)008:880: de ni lnga bcu pas ston don nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag ni /
NK087(shu)008:881: nges pa gtan tshig rnam bcu gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:882: zhes pa'i bzhi tsho gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:883: snod bzhi la bstan pa bzhir /
NK087(shu)008:885: gang la spyan ras gzigs dbang gis //
NK087(shu)008:886: mtha' thug med pa'i 'a gro gang dag /
NK087(shu)008:887: 'di na snod bzhi kho nar gzigs //
NK087(shu)008:889: gdul bya bzhi la brtan pa bzhir nges par byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:890: gtan tshigs kyi yan lag gam spyi don chen po'i bzhis nges pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:891: gang du dgos pa gang nges pa //
NK087(shu)008:892: ngo bo dmigs dang bcas pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:894: gleng bzhi la sogs pa gang la yang /
NK087(shu)008:897: rnam grangs rnam par phye ste don gyi dmigs bzungs ba dang bcas pas ston pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:898: chos rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhis nges pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:899: bka' don gtan tshig rigs pa bzhis //
NK087(shu)008:901: zhes pas lta ba'i don lta bu gcig la yang /
NK087(shu)008:903: don dang mi 'gal ba gtan tshigs kyis rgyas pa /
NK087(shu)008:904: rigs pas 'thad pa dang bzhis nges par bya'o //
NK087(shu)008:906: sbyong ba'i yan lag la gnyis las /
NK087(shu)008:907: bdag don du sbyor ba la so gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:908: rtog pa bzhi dang mtshan nyid bzhi //
NK087(shu)008:909: dgos 'brel bzhi dang yan lag bzhi //
NK087(shu)008:911: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi dag dang //
NK087(shu)008:912: mtshan nyid tshul dang sbyar ba bzhi //
NK087(shu)008:913: rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams //
NK087(shu)008:914: gzhi nyid 'brel dang zag bcas dang //
NK087(shu)008:915: mthong dang sgom dang mthar phyin dang //
NK087(shu)008:916: sangs rgyas pa dang rnam drug dang //
NK087(shu)008:917: bsdus te de yi yan lag yin zhes pa'i tshul gyis bdag don 'bras bu la sbyor ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:918: gzhan don thugs rjes sbyor ba nyer brgyad ni /
NK087(shu)008:919: cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon shes lnga //
NK087(shu)008:920: thabs dang thabs sbyar lnga lnga dang //
NK087(shu)008:921: rang bzhin lnga dang phrin las bzhi //
NK087(shu)008:922: gzhan don spyod pa'i yan lag ste //
NK087(shu)008:924: gzhan don 'gro don la sbyor ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:927: mdo bzhi mthong thos mngon sum dang //
NK087(shu)008:928: bya ba byed dang rnam bzhis 'grel //
NK087(shu)008:930: thos pas nges par 'byung ba'i mdo //
NK087(shu)008:931: mthong bas nges par 'byung ba'i mdo //
NK087(shu)008:932: mngon sum nges par 'byung ba'i mdo //
NK087(shu)008:933: thams cad nas thams cad du 'byung ba med pa'i mdo dang bzhis 'grel lo //
NK087(shu)008:935: 'byin pa'i rtsa ba la gsum ste //
NK087(shu)008:936: nges pa'i rtsa ba man ngag gsum //
NK087(shu)008:937: mi mthun phyogs rnams bcad pa dang //
NK087(shu)008:938: don mthun 'dra ba'i dpe mtshon dang //
NK087(shu)008:939: nges pa'i don la gnas pa yi //
NK087(shu)008:942: mi mthun pa skyon gyi rtsa ba /
NK087(shu)008:945: nga bzhi nga lnga nga drug pas ston no //
NK087(shu)008:946: lung bstan rgyud pa'i bstan pa gtan la dbab pa gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:949: gtan la dbab pa dngos so //
NK087(shu)008:950: dbye na gleng gzhi gleng slang la sogs pa'i gnas 'chad la /
NK087(shu)008:952: lung bstan rgyud pa'i bstan pa yang //
NK087(shu)008:953: de bzhin tshul du 'grel bas te //
NK087(shu)008:955: 'o na lung bstan rgyud pa'i bstan pa la gleng gzhi gleng slang yod kyis /
NK087(shu)008:958: 'grel na gzhung gang la ngos 'dzin te ma dmigs so //
NK087(shu)008:961: gleng gzhi gleng slong ni mi mthun pas smos kyis /
NK087(shu)008:963: thun mong pa yin pas ma smos te ldabs par 'gyur phyin ro //
NK087(shu)008:965: gleng bslang la sogs drug rnams dang //
NK087(shu)008:966: mdo bzhi rtsa ba gsum la sogs //
NK087(shu)008:967: tshul bzhin rjes su sbyar ba bya //
NK087(shu)008:969: gtan la dbab pa dngos la don bzhis te /
NK087(shu)008:970: rgyud 'di lha dang mi yi yul du ji ltar
NK087(shu)008:971: du grags shing rgyud pa lo rgyus kyi don ston
NK087(shu)008:972: pa dang gcig /rgyud gzhan las dpag pa che ba'i
NK087(shu)008:973: tshul bstan pa dang gnyis gang zag gang gis spyod
NK087(shu)008:974: yul yin pa snod kyi tshul bstan pa dang gsum
NK087(shu)008:975: / rgyud ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul bstan pa dang bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)008:976: dang po ni le'u so drug pa las /
NK087(shu)008:977: gang gis gang la gang rgyud pa //
NK087(shu)008:978: de bzhin nyid ni de 'o zhes //
NK087(shu)008:979: chos kyi rgyal pos rgyal tshab la //
NK087(shu)008:980: dgongs pa rigs pa rnams pas rgyud //
NK087(shu)008:983: rgyal ba dgongs pas rgyud pa /
NK087(shu)008:984: rig 'dzin gnyen gyis gsang sgo rgyud pa //
NK087(shu)008:985: gang zag rna ba'i dbang pos rgyud pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:987: kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas /
NK087(shu)008:988: chos sku kun tu bzang pos /
NK087(shu)008:990: nam zla drod pa'i rtsi thog ltar byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad /
NK087(shu)008:991: rigs lngas 'og min chen po'i gnas su 'khor rigs
NK087(shu)008:992: gsum mgon po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK087(shu)008:994: nam mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ltar ngang gis bshad /
NK087(shu)008:995: de dag gis tshig tu brjod pa rna bas thos pa lta bu ni ma yin te /
NK087(shu)008:997: rig 'dzin rigs pas rgyud pa la gsum las /
NK087(shu)008:998: rig pa 'dzin pa mi ma yin pa la rgyud pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:999: kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sprul pa rigs gsum du snang bar mdzad do //
NK087(shu)008:1000: de yang 'jam dpal ni mkhyen rab kyi bdag por
NK087(shu)008:1001: gyur pas gtso bor zab don lta ba'i chos ston
NK087(shu)008:1002: / phyag rdor ni mthu stobs kyi bdag por gyur pas /
NK087(shu)008:1003: drag shul gyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas spyod pa'i
NK087(shu)008:1004: phyogs bstan spyan ras gzigs ni thugs rje'i bdag nyid
NK087(shu)008:1005: du gyur te / snying rjes 'gro ba'i don byed pas sgrub pa'i phyogs bstan /
NK087(shu)008:1007: lta spyod sgrub pa gsum ka lha'i gnas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis /
NK087(shu)008:1008: gzhon nu mdzes pa'i skus lha longs spyod can rnams kyi lus sems dang tshul mthun pas /
NK087(shu)008:1009: lha grags ldan phyogs skyongs la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1011: des skye rgu'i bdag po la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1012: des tshangs pa kun grol la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1013: des tshangs pa gtsug phud la /
NK087(shu)008:1014: des lha'i dbang po brgya byin la /
NK087(shu)008:1015: des lha'i tshom bu 'bum sde la bshad de /
NK087(shu)008:1016: lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'dzin cing /
NK087(shu)008:1017: sangs rgyas kyi gdung sob pa can du gyur to //
NK087(shu)008:1018: klu'i gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis /
NK087(shu)008:1019: bdud rtsi sman gyi skus gdug pa klu nad can rnams kyis lus sems dang mthun pa'i /
NK087(shu)008:1020: klu rgyal mgrin pa nag po la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1021: des klu mo ma ma kha 'dul la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1022: des klu mo 'dul tshangs ma la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1023: des klu yi 'od dga' bo la /
NK087(shu)008:1025: des klu yi tshom bu 'bum la bshad de /
NK087(shu)008:1026: klu rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'dzin cing /
NK087(shu)008:1027: sangs rgyas kyi gdung sob pa can du gyur to //
NK087(shu)008:1028: gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyag na rdo rje 'jigs
NK087(shu)008:1029: byed 'jigs pa'i skus gtum po gnod sbyin rnams kyi
NK087(shu)008:1030: lus dang bsam pa dang tshul mthun pas /
NK087(shu)008:1031: gnod sbyin kun tu bzang po la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1032: des gnod sbyin lag la rdo rje la /
NK087(shu)008:1033: des gnod sbyin grags ldan phyogs skyong la //
NK087(shu)008:1034: des gnod sbyin tshom bu 'bum sde la bshad de /
NK087(shu)008:1035: gnod sbyin rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'dzin
NK087(shu)008:1036: cing sangs rgyas kyi gdung sob pa can du gyur
NK087(shu)008:1037: to // rig pa 'dzin pa mi dang mi ma yin pa gnyis ka la rgyud pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1038: rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar na /
NK087(shu)008:1039: drag shul can gyi ri bo ma la ya zhes bya ba yon de /
NK087(shu)008:1040: de'i mtshan nyid dam tshul ni /
NK087(shu)008:1041: ri de'i rtse mo la gcan gzan gyi rgyal po seng ge'i khras sa yod pa /
NK087(shu)008:1042: 'dab gshog na gcan gzan stag gi khras la yod pa /
NK087(shu)008:1043: rtsa ba dang sdong po dang yal ga dang lo
NK087(shu)008:1044: ma me tog dang 'bras bu sman sna tshogs 'byung
NK087(shu)008:1045: ba'i shing du ma skyes pa ngos la brag dkar
NK087(shu)008:1046: po khyi tshugs pa grangs dang grangs kyis yod pa
NK087(shu)008:1047: / de'i shar ngos na kri pa a su ra'i brag phug ces bya ba /
NK087(shu)008:1048: sgo zla gam la ngo mtshar gyi ri mo rang
NK087(shu)008:1049: byung ba phug rin po che su la brgyad la
NK087(shu)008:1050: nyi zla'i ri mo rang snang ba /
NK087(shu)008:1051: pang thog sum rim dang ldan zhing /
NK087(shu)008:1052: spyi bor chos nyid gcig tu sgrogs pa'i bya ka lan ta ka'i tshang chas pa /
NK087(shu)008:1053: las dang skal bar ldan pa rnams kyis phyin par sla la /
NK087(shu)008:1054: skal bar mi ldan pa rnams kyis bsgrod par mi nus la /
NK087(shu)008:1055: de'i rtser thub pa 'das nas lo nyer brgyad na /
NK087(shu)008:1056: 'khor dam pa'i rigs can lha grags ldan chos skyong klu rgyal 'jog po /
NK087(shu)008:1058: srin po blo gros thabs ldan /
NK087(shu)008:1059: mi las skal ba dang ldan pa li tsa bi dri ma med par grags pa dang lngas /
NK087(shu)008:1060: rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis ri'i rtser 'dus te gdung ba nyer gsum bton pas /
NK087(shu)008:1061: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis gsan nas /
NK087(shu)008:1062: gsang bdag la bskul ba mdzad /
NK087(shu)008:1063: gsang bdag gis zhal gyis bzhes te /
NK087(shu)008:1065: gsang sngags kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor /
NK087(shu)008:1066: de'i sdud pa po blo gros thabs ldan gyis mdzad de /
NK087(shu)008:1067: rin po che gser shog la bee d+aur+ya ya zhun mas rtsa ba rang nan du bris te /
NK087(shu)008:1068: glegs bam du byas nas dgongs pa'i rtsal gyis mdun gyi nam mkha' la sbas so //
NK087(shu)008:1069: rig pa 'dzin pa mi la rgyud pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1070: de ltar bskor ba'i byin rlabs rgyal po dzahl rmi ltas su snang zhing /
NK087(shu)008:1071: bstan pa gsal bar mdzad pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1072: za hor gyi rgyal po a par ra mu nya
NK087(shu)008:1073: bya ba'i sras rgyal po dza zhes bya ba'i rmi
NK087(shu)008:1075: dang po ri'i rtser phyag rdor byon te sku'i khrun
NK087(shu)008:1076: las 'od zer sngon po 'phros 'dzin rten gyi khams
NK087(shu)008:1077: bsregs te mi snang bar byas /
NK087(shu)008:1078: gsung 'brug stong lding ba'i sgra thos /
NK087(shu)008:1079: thugs ka nas rdo rje 'od 'bar ba gcig byung nas snying khar thim /
NK087(shu)008:1080: nyi ma 'od 'bar ba gcig byung nas rgyal po'i spyi bor thim /
NK087(shu)008:1081: zla ba 'od 'bar ba gcig byung nas rkang mthil du thim /
NK087(shu)008:1082: snang srid kyi ltos thams cad rgyal po'i lto bar 'phyo ba gcig rmis so //
NK087(shu)008:1083: gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi bgro ba mdzad cing /
NK087(shu)008:1084: nyi zla zhon nas gser gyi 'khor lo bskor zhing
NK087(shu)008:1085: srid pa gsum gyi kha lo gyen la bsgyur ba
NK087(shu)008:1086: gcig rmis so // yang gsum pa la /
NK087(shu)008:1087: nam mkha'i 'od las sprin gser gyi kha dog can ni 'thibs /
NK087(shu)008:1088: cho 'phrul gyi sgra go sla zhing snyan pas tshim pa ni grags /
NK087(shu)008:1089: rin po che sna tshogs kyi smug pa ni 'thibs /
NK087(shu)008:1091: snang sring gsal ba'i glog ni 'khyug /rin po che'i char babs pa gcig rmis so //
NK087(shu)008:1094: rin po che 'bar ba'i sgron mas snang srid kyi mun pa gsal /
NK087(shu)008:1095: bdud rtsi sman gyi chu rgyun byung bas 'gro ba rnams kyi gcong snying sbyangs /
NK087(shu)008:1096: 'gro ba mtha' dag rdo rje rnal 'byor zhes sgra di ri ri sgrogs pa gcig rmis so //
NK087(shu)008:1097: lnga pa sprin gyi gseb nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
NK087(shu)008:1098: rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od zer shar ba'i dkyil nas /
NK087(shu)008:1099: rad na smug po dpal be'u sgrom dang bcas pa phyi nang gsang ba'i nang na /
NK087(shu)008:1100: gser gyi glegs bam la bee d+aur+ya zhun mas rtsa
NK087(shu)008:1101: ba rang gnas su bris pa'i glegs bam mang po
NK087(shu)008:1102: skar mda' sa la ltung ba bzhin du babs pa
NK087(shu)008:1103: gcig rmis so // drug pa la glegs bam de
NK087(shu)008:1104: rnams la byang chub sems dpa' dang rig 'dzin dang
NK087(shu)008:1105: lha mo tshad med pa rnams /
NK087(shu)008:1106: yon tan gyi sgra sgrogs shing /
NK087(shu)008:1107: mchod bstod dang bskor ba byed pa gcig rmis so //
NK087(shu)008:1108: bdun pa la nam mkha'i sprin gseb nas lung bstan pa'i sgra byung ste /
NK087(shu)008:1109: las dang skal bar rab ldan zhing //
NK087(shu)008:1110: rgyal ba 'byung bar lung bstan pa'i //
NK087(shu)008:1111: bsod nams can gyi dra ma khyod //
NK087(shu)008:1112: sprul pas ji ltar lung bstan dus //
NK087(shu)008:1113: da lta dus der sngon shar gyis //
NK087(shu)008:1114: 'khor ba'i snying por bya ba'i phyir //
NK087(shu)008:1115: nga yi cho 'phrul byin rlabs kyis //
NK087(shu)008:1116: bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig /skal ldan khyod la bstan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)008:1117: zhes lung bstan pa zhig rmis so //
NK087(shu)008:1118: de nas mnal sad de 'khor sogs la rmi lam rnams brjod pas /
NK087(shu)008:1119: skal bar ldan nges pas sgrub pa mdzod cig zer nas /
NK087(shu)008:1120: sgrub pa mdzad de ri de'i rtser byon pas /
NK087(shu)008:1121: rin po che las byas pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i
NK087(shu)008:1122: sku bzhugs pa phyag rdor dngos su bzhugs sam snyam
NK087(shu)008:1123: nas mthong nas / dgyes te skor ba dang phyag byas nas /
NK087(shu)008:1124: sngon tshe gong nas sgrub pa'i lha //
NK087(shu)008:1125: las kyis mjal ba'i lha mchog 'di //
NK087(shu)008:1126: skal pa brgyar yang mi gtong ngo //
NK087(shu)008:1127: e ma ngo mtshar mchog gi sku //
NK087(shu)008:1129: mos pas gzugs kyi lha mchog 'dzin //
NK087(shu)008:1130: zhes zla ba bdun du yi dam bya ste sgrubs
NK087(shu)008:1131: pas rmi ltas dang mthun pa'i glegs bam rnams snang
NK087(shu)008:1132: ngo // las dang thugs rjes 'brel pas mthong ba'i glegs bam la /
NK087(shu)008:1133: rab tu dga' ba'i tshul gyis bklag pas yig 'bru gcig kyang brda' ma 'jal lo //
NK087(shu)008:1134: e ma ho sngar gyi rmi ltas dang sbyar na
NK087(shu)008:1135: ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i don gcig yod nges pa
NK087(shu)008:1136: la / bdag gis mi rtogs pa ci nyes snyam du bshums so //
NK087(shu)008:1137: de nas the tshom zhugs nas /
NK087(shu)008:1138: 'jig rten gyi khams na brda' mjal bya su yod ces bsgrags pas /
NK087(shu)008:1139: za hor gyi rgyal po u pa ra dza shes
NK087(shu)008:1140: nyen che zer nas spyan drangs pas byon du ma
NK087(shu)008:1141: bzhed / glang po che la bkal nas skyal bas kyang brda' ma 'jal te /
NK087(shu)008:1142: rgyal po nyid kyis dpag 'tshal gsung nas slar bkur te byung ngo //
NK087(shu)008:1143: de nas yang yab rgyal po la kha thung yum
NK087(shu)008:1144: kra le ba can bya ba la bu dge slong
NK087(shu)008:1145: ku ru ra dza zhes bya tshe lo stong thub
NK087(shu)008:1146: / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang gi sprul pa de la bstan pas /
NK087(shu)008:1147: des brtags pas thugs kyi sgrub pa /
NK087(shu)008:1148: rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong gi le'u dang /
NK087(shu)008:1149: bsgrubs lugs kyi le'u gnyis rtogs lam rim ltar byas nas so yang skad /
NK087(shu)008:1150: rgyal po nyid kyis mchod pa chen po byas te
NK087(shu)008:1151: gsol ba btab pas mdo 'di'i dbang du byas nas
NK087(shu)008:1153: gang yin yang de las byung ba bzhin du bsgrub pa mdzad pas /
NK087(shu)008:1154: rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong mngon sum du gzigs /
NK087(shu)008:1155: rigs kyi bu dngos grub ci 'dod gsungs pa la /
NK087(shu)008:1156: glegs bam 'di rnams kyi don rtogs par 'tshal gsungs pas /
NK087(shu)008:1157: rigs kyi bu rang gi phung po sbyongs dang /
NK087(shu)008:1158: lag na rdo rjes lung ston par 'gyur gyis gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur to //
NK087(shu)008:1159: de nas spro ba skyes te sgrub sgrub lugs pas pa mdzad pas /
NK087(shu)008:1160: phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mngon sum du mthong /
NK087(shu)008:1161: brtul zhugs kyis rdo rje lan gsum nam mkha' la spar te slar slangs te /
NK087(shu)008:1162: rgyal po'i gtsug tu bzhag ste dbang bskur /
NK087(shu)008:1163: snod du rung bar byas te sgrib pa dag nas /
NK087(shu)008:1164: glegs bam gyi don rnams nam lang pa na nyi ma shar ba bzhin du mkhyen nas /
NK087(shu)008:1165: tan tra sde bco brgyad du phye ste /
NK087(shu)008:1167: glang po che rab 'bog /glang po chur 'jug /sngags rgyas mnyam sbyor ro //
NK087(shu)008:1168: gsung gi tan tra gsum ni /
NK087(shu)008:1184: don thams cad kyi 'jug sdud thabs kyi zhags pa bam po bco brgyad pa /
NK087(shu)008:1185: dam tshig sa ma ya 'bum ste bkod pa'i rgyud /
NK087(shu)008:1186: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa /
NK087(shu)008:1187: de ltar sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi rgyud bco lnga /
NK087(shu)008:1188: spyi'i rgyud gsum ste bco brgyad du phye nas /
NK087(shu)008:1189: 'di man chad gang zag rna ba'i dbang po'i brgyud pa yin gsungs in tra b+hu ti la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1190: des na ga su tri la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1191: des gu ya su tri la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1192: des ku ku ra dza la /
NK087(shu)008:1193: des ro langs bde ba la /
NK087(shu)008:1194: des bzhad pa rdo rje la /
NK087(shu)008:1195: des za hor gyi rgyal po bra ha ti dza la /
NK087(shu)008:1197: des ti ra ma ti la /
NK087(shu)008:1198: des bde ba gsal mdzad la /
NK087(shu)008:1199: des dar ma bo d+hi la /
NK087(shu)008:1200: des bal po ba su d+ha ra la /
NK087(shu)008:1202: yang na dar ma bo d+his snub la gnang ste /
NK087(shu)008:1203: de'i lo rgyus yang snubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches lo lnga bcu rtsa bzhi la /
NK087(shu)008:1204: bal po ba su d+ha ra la chos zhus pa'i yon yul mnyes par byas pas /
NK087(shu)008:1205: gu ru'i zhal nas nga'i chos rnams tshar bas /
NK087(shu)008:1206: nga'i slob dpon bram ze gsal ba rgyal mtshan bya
NK087(shu)008:1207: ba lo drug brgya thub gcig bzhugs kyis de la
NK087(shu)008:1209: snubs kyis de'i spyan sngar byon te chos mang du zhus /
NK087(shu)008:1210: dgongs 'dus kyi gdam ngag kyang mang du gnang /
NK087(shu)008:1211: dbang bskur yang mang du gnang ngo //
NK087(shu)008:1212: de nas dgongs 'dus kyi gzhung zhus pas /
NK087(shu)008:1214: mdo mkhan dar ma bo d+hi dang /
NK087(shu)008:1215: da na ra shi ta bya ba gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:1216: bru zha'i mkhan po so kya e lam ka ra /
NK087(shu)008:1217: te bde ba gsal ba'i rgyan nam bde ba bsal mdzad do //
NK087(shu)008:1219: 'bru sha'i yul du spyan drangs nas bzhud kyis der zhus shig gsungs /
NK087(shu)008:1220: snubs kyis der phyin pas chos srid dang chos dmag byed pa dang 'dom ste /
NK087(shu)008:1221: dmag gseb tu dar ma bo d+hi dang /
NK087(shu)008:1223: che btsan skyes gsum bzhugs pa'i zhal mthong ste chos zhus pas /
NK087(shu)008:1224: lo pan gsum gyis bru sha'i yi ge las bru
NK087(shu)008:1225: sha'i yul du khrom bsgyur du gtan la phab nas
NK087(shu)008:1226: snang ngo // sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches bod du byon nas /
NK087(shu)008:1227: thugs kyi sras so ye shes dbang phyug sru legs
NK087(shu)008:1228: pa'i sgron me dpa' gor 'phags pa blon chen khu
NK087(shu)008:1229: lung yon tan rgya mtsho bzhi'i nang nas snubs khu
NK087(shu)008:1230: lung yon tan rgya mtsho la gnang /
NK087(shu)008:1231: des rgyal blo gros byang chub dang /
NK087(shu)008:1232: sna nam tshul khrims byang chub la gnang /
NK087(shu)008:1233: rgya yis tho kar gnam sde la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1234: des sna nam zhal yon la sogs pa bzhi la /
NK087(shu)008:1235: bar du gzhu gsod shag la /
NK087(shu)008:1236: tha ma lha rje 'ug pa lung pa la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1237: lha rje'i slob ma rtse mo bzhi btsun pa dang lnga las /
NK087(shu)008:1238: de'i nang nas bde gshegs gru phug pa zur chung shes rab grags la /
NK087(shu)008:1239: des ka bzhi gdung brgyad la sogs pho so dang
NK087(shu)008:1240: mthun 'jug gi rtse mor gyur pa tsa ga bla
NK087(shu)008:1241: mar bshad pa'i rtse mor gyur pa me nyag 'byung
NK087(shu)008:1242: grags lta dgongs kyi rtse mor gyur pa zur chung
NK087(shu)008:1243: dgon pa / mgon rgya'i rtse mor gyur pa btsun pa pe tsa me ru'o //
NK087(shu)008:1245: gong gdung brgyad ces pa'i mchan skyon ston nyag yas
NK087(shu)008:1246: yang geng bla ma 'dra tig jo shag slan shakya
NK087(shu)008:1247: bzang / chu 'go'i ma thog byang 'bar ne sang kyi kya /
NK087(shu)008:1248: chos seng byang gi shud kyi zla grags sna nam gyi nub ston bag ma /
NK087(shu)008:1254: pa la bshad de nyi zla ltar grags so //
NK087(shu)008:1255: thugs kyi sras bzhi kas lha rje nya ri ba la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1256: lha rje'i bu slob grangs las 'das kyang nye ston dal dang /
NK087(shu)008:1259: yongs su grags pa thob pa ston bzhi dang /
NK087(shu)008:1262: rtse rgya nag /lha rje 'dar nag bya ba bdog pa las /
NK087(shu)008:1263: ston bzhi'i nang nas phubs ston kha rag snying po la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1264: des sras pad+ma 'bar ba la bshad /
NK087(shu)008:1267: gnyis pa gzhan las dpags pa che ba'i tshul bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1268: theg pa thams cad kyi yang rtse yin pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1269: ri rgyal lhun po'i rtser phyin pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1270: bstan pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1271: nam mkha' la 'byung ba bzhi shar ba lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1272: rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1273: gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i nyi ma lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1274: lung thams cad kyi spyi 'grel yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1275: rgya mtsho chen po la chu dang chu bran 'bab pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1276: man ngag thams cad kyi nying khu yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1277: mar gyi yang zhun lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1278: don thams cad kyi 'jug yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1279: so nam gyi khe sgrub pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1280: chos thams cad kyi me long yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1281: 'phrul gyi me long g.ya' dag pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1282: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i zhe phug yin par nges pa'i che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1283: rgyal po'i sras gcig pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1284: 'bras bu thams cad kyi zhugs sa yin pas nges
NK087(shu)008:1285: par che ba rgyal po'i bka' rtags thob pa lta
NK087(shu)008:1286: bu / 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs shul yin pas nges par che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1287: rgyal lam dang khri'u pa lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1289: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lam yin pas nges par che ba /
NK087(shu)008:1290: khri lam mam stong shul lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1291: gsum pa gang zag gang gi spyod yul yin pa snod kyi tshul bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1292: blo zhib pa bas kyang ches zhib pa /
NK087(shu)008:1293: zab pa bas kyang ches zab pa'i spyod yul yin gyis kun gyi thun mong ma yin no //
NK087(shu)008:1294: bzhi pa rgyud ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul ni /
NK087(shu)008:1295: dbang po rab la mtshan bstan pas go bas dper
NK087(shu)008:1296: na sman pa 'tsho byed gzhon nus lag gi rtsa
NK087(shu)008:1297: la brtags pas lus kyi nad ngos zin pa lta
NK087(shu)008:1298: bu / 'bring la don rnam par phye bas rtogs pa sman gyi kha byang lta bu /
NK087(shu)008:1299: tha ma 'bru re gnyis res rtogs pa sman gcig
NK087(shu)008:1300: kyang dri dang kha dog la sogs pa du mas
NK087(shu)008:1302: dang po rab la mtshan bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1303: sgra skad ngos bzung ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:1306: mtshan bshad pa rnams tig par shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)008:1307: 'bring la don rnam par phye na bzhi ste /
NK087(shu)008:1309: gdul bya'i don dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:1310: gsang ba spyi gzhung dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:1311: gzhi lam 'bras bu dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:1312: khyad par rang gzhung dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1314: rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi dang /
NK087(shu)008:1316: yongs su shes par bya ba rgyud kyi dngos po byung tshul bstan pa dang /
NK087(shu)008:1317: dri lan du rgyud dang ston pa la bstod pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1320: rgyud don rnam par gsum khungs dang rgyud /
NK087(shu)008:1324: thun mong bca' gzhi spyi'i rgyud de /
NK087(shu)008:1326: le'u dang po thun mong bca' gzhi'i gleng gazhi'o //
NK087(shu)008:1328: gdam pa lung bstan rtsa ba'i rgyud /
NK087(shu)008:1329: gleng gzhi spyi yi rgyud ces bya /
NK087(shu)008:1331: gleng gzhi spyi'i rgyu'am rgyu'i rgyu'o gdam ngag nges par bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)008:1332: 'khor 'dus sme dang zhes pas le'u gsum pa'i gdung
NK087(shu)008:1333: ba nyer gsum thog ma dam pas gdung ba ston
NK087(shu)008:1334: pa'i le'u ni / rgyu dngos po /
NK087(shu)008:1336: le'u gang gis gdung ba sel bar sgros pa'i bzhi
NK087(shu)008:1337: par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rdor
NK087(shu)008:1338: la gdung ba sol cig par bskul /
NK087(shu)008:1339: phyag rdor gyis bsal bar zhal gyis bzhes pa ni gleng gzhi'i rkyen no //
NK087(shu)008:1340: le'u lnga pa'i stod ni gleng gzhi rang gi ngo bo phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)008:1341: ston pa gsang bdag /bstan pa dgongs pa 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyud /
NK087(shu)008:1344: dus thub pa 'das lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dus /
NK087(shu)008:1345: sdud pa po blo gros thabs ldan no //
NK087(shu)008:1346: lung dam par 'gro bar gsol ba btab pa'i /
NK087(shu)008:1347: le'u lnga pa'i smad rkyen gleng slang pa la gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:1348: ston pas mdun bsus te gleng slang ba dang 'khor gyis gus par dris te gleng slang ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:1349: gsum pa rgyud kyi dngos po byung tshul bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1350: snying po byang chub kyi byung tshul bcu gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:1351: dbang bskur thabs kyi byung tshul bcu gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:1354: rgyud gnas tshul lugs kyi byung tshul bcu gnyis so //
NK087(shu)008:1355: rgyud gnas lugs kyi byung tshul bcu gnyis la /
NK087(shu)008:1360: de rnams sbyar nas bshad nas /
NK087(shu)008:1361: dang po rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1362: ma rig mun sel gyi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1363: dper na ma dang bu phrad pa ltar du bstan
NK087(shu)008:1364: pa la le'u gcig ste drug pas rmongs pa gdung
NK087(shu)008:1365: ba sel ba zhes bya'i ston no //
NK087(shu)008:1366: gnyis pa sgron ma yongs su bkod pa'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1367: ye shes rang gnas lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1368: nyi ma'i snying po ltar bstan pa la le'u gnyis te /
NK087(shu)008:1369: rdo rje sems dpa'i cho 'phrul bkod pa'i bdun pa
NK087(shu)008:1370: dang brgyad pas gsang sngags gnyis kyi ngo bo bstan
NK087(shu)008:1371: pa'i bstan no // gsum pa gang gis nges pa rnyed pa'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1372: mngon par don snyed kyi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1373: dbul mos gter rnyed par ltar bstan pa la le'u drug ste /
NK087(shu)008:1374: dgu pa rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u /
NK087(shu)008:1375: bcu khyad par dam pa'i pa /
NK087(shu)008:1376: bcu gcig rgyud dag pa'i skyes rgyud tan pa'i pa /
NK087(shu)008:1378: bcu gsum pa skyes bu dang dbang thob pa'i /
NK087(shu)008:1379: bcu bzhi pa skyes dam pa dbang thob pa'i rnams kyis ston no //
NK087(shu)008:1380: bzhi pa snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa'i byung tshul de kho na nyid kyi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1381: nam mkha' ltar bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1382: le'u bco lnga pas ston don kho na nyid du nges pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1383: lnga pa dgongs par nges par 'brel ba'i byung tshul ma 'dres yongs rdzogs kyi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1384: rgya mtsho'i nang du nyi zla skar gyi gzugs brnyan shar ba ltar bstan pa la le'u bzhi /
NK087(shu)008:1385: bcu drug rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul pa /
NK087(shu)008:1386: bcu bdun chos snang ba'i pa /
NK087(shu)008:1387: bco kun brjod pa'i brgyad pa /
NK087(shu)008:1388: bcu dgu yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho 'phrul pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1389: drug pa gdul bya skabs la babs pas byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1390: mtshan ma rang zhi'i lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1391: dpa' bos dgra thul ba ltar bstan pa le'u bcu
NK087(shu)008:1392: gnyis te nyi shu pa nas so gcig pa man
NK087(shu)008:1394: bdun pa byin rlabs 'byung ba'i lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1395: byin gyis rlabs kyi snang ba'i tshul rgya mtsho /
NK087(shu)008:1396: nyi shu pa ma dag pa'i rgyud bstan pa'i /
NK087(shu)008:1397: nyer gcig pa 'das pa sngon byung gi /
NK087(shu)008:1398: nyer gnyis pa ta ru tra 'khor bcas kyi spyod yul bstan pa /
NK087(shu)008:1399: nyer gsum pa cho 'phrul skul ba /
NK087(shu)008:1400: nyer bzhi pa bka' sgros pa /
NK087(shu)008:1401: nyer lnga pa bka' sgros bcad pas /
NK087(shu)008:1402: nyer drug las rdor bskos btab pa /
NK087(shu)008:1403: nyer bdun pa bdud yongs su btul ba /
NK087(shu)008:1404: nyer brgyad pa sman pa gdung ba ston pa /
NK087(shu)008:1405: nyer dgu pa rgud pa sbyangs ba /
NK087(shu)008:1406: sum cu dgongs pa bskul ba /
NK087(shu)008:1407: so gcig pa lung bstan pa'i le'u /
NK087(shu)008:1408: chen po rlabs ltar bstan pa la le'u bzhi /
NK087(shu)008:1409: so thugs ye shes snang ba rgyan bkod pa gnyis pa /
NK087(shu)008:1410: sku yongs su snang ba dam pa so gsum pa /
NK087(shu)008:1411: so bzhi gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa /
NK087(shu)008:1412: so spyod pa mi zad pa rgyan gyi tsakra bkod pa'i lnga'o //
NK087(shu)008:1413: brgyad pa rgyud pa thams cad thabs kyis grags pa'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1414: mi mthun skyon sel gyi lta ba stag tshang sel
NK087(shu)008:1415: ba'am lta bu rang gzhan gyi dug sdong sel ba
NK087(shu)008:1416: ltar du bstan pa la le'u gsum /
NK087(shu)008:1417: rmongs pa sel ba'i dpyod thun grol ba so drug pa /
NK087(shu)008:1418: so gang gi dri ba the tshom bcad pa bdun pa /
NK087(shu)008:1419: so brgyad sngon 'byung gi gtam brgyud brjod pa pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1420: dgu pa gang gi ched du mdzad pa'i byung tshul grol don thun gyi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1421: sman pa mkhas pa nad gso ba ltar bstan pa la le'u bzhi /
NK087(shu)008:1422: so thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dgu pa /
NK087(shu)008:1423: bzhi gsung gi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu pa /
NK087(shu)008:1424: zhe thabs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa gcig pa /
NK087(shu)008:1425: zhe gnyis sku'i mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1426: bcu pa lung chen nges par bstan pa'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1427: nges pa phyis 'byung gi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1428: blon po rig pa can gyi zhal chem ltar bstan pa la /
NK087(shu)008:1429: le'u zhe gsum pas ston no //
NK087(shu)008:1430: bcu gcig pa las rgyun yongs su gcod pa'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1431: mtshan ma rang dag gi lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1432: khrus mkhan mkhas pas khrus byas pa ltar bstan pa
NK087(shu)008:1433: la le'u gcig ste zhe gcig pas cho 'phrul sngon
NK087(shu)008:1435: bcu gnyis pa dgongs pa rnam par sgrol ba'i byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1436: dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba'i lta ba /
NK087(shu)008:1437: slob dpon tshogs nas rgyal po yi chab srid 'dzin
NK087(shu)008:1438: pa ltar bstan pa la le'u sum cu so gcig
NK087(shu)008:1440: de yang sa bcad rnam pa gnyis /
NK087(shu)008:1441: chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa bcur dgongs bsgro ba dang /
NK087(shu)008:1442: mtshan bslab pa'i mtha' bcu dang sbyar te dgongs pa bgro ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:1443: chos kyi rnam grangs bcur dgongs pa 'gro ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:1444: le'u zhe lnga pa'i nang nas mar /
NK087(shu)008:1445: dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la 'jug pa mdo rgyud na /
NK087(shu)008:1447: rang bzhin ma bcos par ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:1457: dang po mdzad du 'jug pa la le'u bcu gnyis yod pa las don rnam par gsum ste /
NK087(shu)008:1458: spyod pa'i 'dren sgo la 'jug pa la /
NK087(shu)008:1461: rtsa ba gsum gyis 'byin par byed do //
NK087(shu)008:1462: zhe lnga bkod pa rnam par 'grel zhes bya bas ston /
NK087(shu)008:1463: tha mal gyi sbyor sgo la yang /
NK087(shu)008:1466: rtsa ba gsum gyis 'byin par byed do //
NK087(shu)008:1467: zhe drug pas rgyu ba rnam par 'grel zhes bya ba'i ston /
NK087(shu)008:1468: nges pa'i gsang sgo 'jug pa la yang /
NK087(shu)008:1469: yan lag drug gis 'byed pa la le'u drug ste /
NK087(shu)008:1470: zhe bdun pa rgyu'i gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa
NK087(shu)008:1471: zhes bya ba'i yan lag gleng gzhi zhe brgyad pa
NK087(shu)008:1472: rtsa ba'i yan lag rtsa ba sbyor ba'i yan lag
NK087(shu)008:1474: 'brel pa'i yan lag gi dgongs ched bstan pa'i zhe dgu pa 'brel pa /
NK087(shu)008:1475: dgos chad kyi yan lag /lnga bcu /
NK087(shu)008:1476: yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag rnam par grol ba'i
NK087(shu)008:1477: 'dren pa tshig gi yan lag /nga gcig pa nges
NK087(shu)008:1478: pa'i yan dam pa yan lag sbred pa'i lag /nga
NK087(shu)008:1479: thabs rnam par 'grel ba zhes bya ba'i gnyis pa
NK087(shu)008:1480: sbyor ba byang chub kyi yan lag go //
NK087(shu)008:1481: mdo bzhis 'grol ba la le'u gcig ste /
NK087(shu)008:1482: nga gsum pas mdo rgya cher 'dres pa'i ston /
NK087(shu)008:1483: rtsa ba gsum gyis 'byin pa la le'u gsum /
NK087(shu)008:1484: chos nyid kyi me long bstan pa'i nga bzhi pa mtshon pa dpe'i rtsa ba /
NK087(shu)008:1485: nga lnga pa mi mthun chos thams cad kyi rtsa
NK087(shu)008:1486: ba mun pa'i spyod yul bstan pa'i pa skyon gyi
NK087(shu)008:1487: rtsa ba / nga drug pa don nges pa'i chos
NK087(shu)008:1488: thams cad kyi rtsa rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul
NK087(shu)008:1490: nga bdun pa rang bzhin sbyor rang bzhin gyi ma bcos par bya ba /
NK087(shu)008:1491: nga de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa ljon
NK087(shu)008:1492: shing skyed pa'i brgyad pa ljon shing skyed par bya
NK087(shu)008:1493: ba / sbyor rjes 'jug gi nga dgu pa rjes su 'jug par bya ba /
NK087(shu)008:1494: drug cu pa sgron ma sbyor mig gi sgron ma
NK087(shu)008:1495: bstan pa'i le'u bsre bar bya ba re gcig pa
NK087(shu)008:1496: khyad par du sbyor ba'i sgron ma bstan pa'i 'gro
NK087(shu)008:1497: ba / re gnyis pa yul dam pa la 'jug pa yul la 'jug pa /
NK087(shu)008:1498: re gsum pa me long mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i btag pa /
NK087(shu)008:1499: re bzhi pa mthun sgyu ma rol pa rnam par grol ba'i par 'jug pa /
NK087(shu)008:1500: re lnga pa rang byung bdud rtsi nad gso bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)008:1501: spyi don gnyis pa mtshan bslab pa'i mtha' bcu ni /
NK087(shu)008:1502: re drug pa gzhi dam dam tshig pa'i mchog tshig gis bzung ba la bslab pa /
NK087(shu)008:1503: re bdun pa rgyud thos snyan rgyur dam pa mchog gi pas sgrol ba la bslab pa /
NK087(shu)008:1504: re brgyad pa chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba'i sgo kun nas bsdur ba /
NK087(shu)008:1505: re dgu pa bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa'i phul du mkhas pa 'byung ba /
NK087(shu)008:1506: bdun cu pa rim sbyor lung bstan pa'i pa dbang gis sgrod pa /
NK087(shu)008:1507: don sbyor spyod 'jug gi gcig pa spyod pas dor ba /
NK087(shu)008:1508: don gnyis pa the tshom yongs su gcod pa'i thag lta bas bcad pa /
NK087(shu)008:1509: don sbyor dbang rgyur gyi gsum pa nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis blangs ba /
NK087(shu)008:1510: don bzhi pa don par sgrub pa'i don man ngag gis sgrub pas /
NK087(shu)008:1511: don lnga pa 'bu ta kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus
NK087(shu)008:1512: pa'i le'u mdo don gcig tu bsdus pa la bslab
NK087(shu)008:1513: pa / dgongs ma lam so nam gyi khe sgrub pa ltar du bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1514: bzhi pa dri lan du rgyud dang ston pa la bstod par bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1515: e ma'o skyes chen gsang ba'i bdag /rtsal chen smra ba seng ge sgra //
NK087(shu)008:1516: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs //
NK087(shu)008:1517: sangs rgyas kun mngon ye nas byung //
NK087(shu)008:1518: khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes //
NK087(shu)008:1519: che mchog che btsan dam pa'i sku //
NK087(shu)008:1520: bde gshegs kun gyi bshes gnyen mchog /sems pa sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
NK087(shu)008:1521: zhes pas ston pa la bstod /
NK087(shu)008:1522: kun gyi 'byung gnas me long gsal //
NK087(shu)008:1523: phyogs kun gang la nges pa yi //
NK087(shu)008:1524: theg chen rmad grags ngo mtshar che //
NK087(shu)008:1525: gsang chen byung tshul ngo mtshar che //
NK087(shu)008:1526: a ho zhes nges pa dam par mngon par bstod do //
NK087(shu)008:1527: tha ma 'bru re gnyer bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)008:1528: bshad pa'i yan lag 'dren pa tshig bcu'i skye bar ston nas gzhung 'chad par byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1529: spyi don gsum pa 'bras bu'i don lnga ste ngo bo /
NK087(shu)008:1534: ma 'dres rnam grangs su snang ba'i ngo bo dang /
NK087(shu)008:1535: dbyer med lhun grub tu snang ba'i ngo bo'o //
NK087(shu)008:1536: ma 'dres rnam grangs su snang ba ni /
NK087(shu)008:1537: bsdu na rten byed pa'i sku gsung go rta sprod
NK087(shu)008:1538: pa'i thugs rig cing mkhyen pa'i yon dgos 'dod 'byung
NK087(shu)008:1539: ba tan phrin bya ba byed pa'i rnam pa lnga
NK087(shu)008:1540: / 'bring du sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las nyi shu rtsa lnga ste /
NK087(shu)008:1549: ngo bo nyid med pa'i gsung ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:1550: chos kyi sku'i gsung nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:1551: longs sku'i gsung me long lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:1552: gsang ba sku'i gsung seng ge lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)008:1553: sprul pa sku'i gsung ni gsung gcig yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1556: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes /
NK087(shu)008:1557: me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK087(shu)008:1558: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
NK087(shu)008:1559: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes /
NK087(shu)008:1560: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK087(shu)008:1569: lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las lnga ni /
NK087(shu)008:1571: sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ngo //
NK087(shu)008:1573: 'bras bu nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas /
NK087(shu)008:1574: sku dang yon tan las nyi shu lnga bsdus mtha' yas rnams /
NK087(shu)008:1576: dbyer med lhun grub tu snang ba'i ngo bo ni /
NK087(shu)008:1577: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dbyer med du lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1578: de yang don bsdus las lhun rdzogs rnam kun mkhyen pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1584: bdag don grub pa po dang gzhan don mdzad pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1585: dang po ni gzhi'i chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mngon du gyur te /
NK087(shu)008:1586: lam gyi rtsol ba dang bral ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:1587: gzhan don mdzad pa po la gsum /
NK087(shu)008:1588: thugs rjes gzigs pa'i tshul yul du byas na gzung 'dzin can du 'gyur /
NK087(shu)008:1590: zhe na dbyer med du gzigs so //
NK087(shu)008:1591: dbyer med la gzigs bya gzigs byed mi 'thad do
NK087(shu)008:1592: zhe na tha dad med kyang de yis char 'dogs
NK087(shu)008:1593: so // gzigs nas thugs rje skyes pa'i tshul //
NK087(shu)008:1594: skyes nas don mdzad pa'i tshul lo //
NK087(shu)008:1596: thabs mkhas pa'i mdzad pa byung tshul brgyad pa /
NK087(shu)008:1597: yul dang mthun pa'i mdzad pa byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1599: rmad byung che ba'i mdzad pa byung tshul /
NK087(shu)008:1601: las rgyun gcod pa'i mdzad pa byung tshul bcu gcig pa /
NK087(shu)008:1602: bstan pa 'chad pa'i mdzad pa byung tshul bcu gnyis pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1604: spangs thob med par rig pa rang snang mngon du byas pa'o //
NK087(shu)008:1605: de yang le'u lnga pa las /
NK087(shu)008:1606: gzhan nas ma byung rang byung bar //
NK087(shu)008:1607: shes la snyad brtags ma shes la //
NK087(shu)008:1608: gtor zhes tha snyad rtag par zad //
NK087(shu)008:1611: sems nyid rtogs na sangs rgyas te /
NK087(shu)008:1615: sku de dag ni rtag par yang zung gcig /mi
NK087(shu)008:1616: rtag par yang zung cig /yod par yang zung cig
NK087(shu)008:1617: /med par yang zung cig /gcig par yang zung cig
NK087(shu)008:1618: /tha dad par yang zung cig /gcig tha dad kyi
NK087(shu)008:1619: ngo bo las grol bar yang zung cig /ces pa
NK087(shu)008:1621: sku ji lta ba bzhin du /
NK087(shu)008:1622: gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las kyang shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)008:1624: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga ka mtha' drug las grol ba'o //
NK087(shu)008:1625: rje yis gsung pas zhal gyi gdams pa thob //
NK087(shu)008:1626: gdams pa'i gnad kyis rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs //
NK087(shu)008:1627: chos kyi spyan gyis tshig gis 'brel don rig /thob pa rigs rtogs ldan pa'i brtson seng la //
NK087(shu)008:1628: rje yis bka' bsgos bu yis bskul ba'i phyir //
NK087(shu)008:1629: mdo khog rin chen sgron ma 'di bkod pas //
NK087(shu)008:1630: bla ma mnyes shing kun don 'grub par shog //
NK087(shu)008:1631: khog don rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba /
NK087(shu)008:1632: gsang sngags 'dzin pa brtson seng gis bkod pa'o //
